synthesis_conditions.temperature: room temperature for 24 h, then treated at 373 K in vacuo for guest-free phase

solvents.name: methanol
solvents.amount: ca. 2 mL for CH3COOK dissolution, 200 mL for solution B

chemicals_used.name: CH3COOK
chemicals_used.amount: 0.50 g for solution A, 0.50 g for solution B

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: treatment at 373 K in vacuo for guest-free phase
